title: Silver+ Team Recruitment
body:
Hey guys looking to recruit players for a team in the silver to plat elo range from last season. Anyone is welcome at this stage, recruiting for a second team to vs the main roster of the same elo.

Please add me (IGN: Nat The Rat) or comment here. please send me a message with your preferred main role.

Rules:

Must have a Mic
Able to scrim 3x a week
Available for clash weekends.
Communication and tiltproof are the skills we are really striving for early on in the recruitment phase!
